Accommodations

To give guests the freedom to choose the best accommodations for their needs, we have not reserved a room block at a specific hotel.

Here are some suggestions:

Mariott Courtyard Crossroads

Distance from McDarrises: 14 minutes / 10.4 miles

Distance from Tastets: 6 minutes / 2.7 miles

Distance from the venue: 31 min / 25.7 miles

Mariott Courtyard Cary

Distance from McDarrises: 10 minutes / 6.3 miles

Distance from Tastets: 9 minutes / 3.4 miles

Distance from the venue: 26 min / 21.6 miles

Hyatt Place Chapel Hill

Distance from McDarrises: 24 minutes / 17.9 miles

Distance from Tastets: 36 minutes / 26.6 miles

Distance from the venue: 11 min / 7.2 miles

Mayton Inn

Distance from McDarrises: 15 minutes / 8.3 miles

Distance from Tastets: 11 minutes / 5.5 miles

Distance from the venue: 31 min / 23.6 miles

Carolina Inn

Distance from McDarrises: 28 minutes / 19.2 miles

Distance from Tastets: 35 minutes / 29.8 miles

Distance from the venue: 16 min / 8.9 miles
